content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: light_blue_bed
inventory=[{"type": "quartz_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 10}, {"type": "stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 56, "index": 15}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "blue_orchid", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 40}, {"type": "ladder", "quantity": 14, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft a light_blue_bed, I first need to craft a light_blue_dye. To do this, I can place the blue_orchid in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: light_blue_bed
inventory=[{"type": "light_blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "blue_orchid", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "quartz_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 10}, {"type": "stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 56, "index": 15}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 40}, {"type": "ladder", "quantity": 14, "index": 42}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the light_blue_dye, I need to move it to the inventory and place the white_bed in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: light_blue_bed
inventory=[{"type": "quartz_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 10}, {"type": "light_blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 56, "index": 15}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 40}, {"type": "ladder", "quantity": 14, "index": 42}]
thought: Now that the white_bed is in the crafting grid, I need to place the light_blue_dye next to it.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 2 with quantity 1
